allow: Bash(cmd /c "if exist .env (echo .env file exists) else (echo .env file does not exist & copy .env.example .env)")
Bash(cmd /c "dir src\app\api\auth\send-verification 2>nul && echo Directory exists || echo Directory does not exist")
Bash(cmd /c "del /F node_modules\.prisma\client\query_engine-windows.dll.node 2>nul && echo Deleted || echo File not found or in use")
Bash(cmd /c "rd /s /q node_modules\.prisma\client 2>nul & echo Removed Prisma client cache")
Bash(cmd /c "dir src\app\api\payment 2>nul || echo Payment API directory not found")
Bash(cmd /c "if exist .env (echo .env exists) else (echo .env not found - using .env.example)")
Bash(cmd /c "rd /s /q node_modules\.prisma 2>nul & echo Deleted Prisma client cache")
Bash(cmd /c "taskkill /F /IM node.exe >nul 2>&1 & timeout /t 2 /nobreak >nul & npm run dev")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: TechJob platform with payment system

- Complete Next.js application with TypeScript
- Prisma ORM with PostgreSQL database
- NextAuth authentication for company and engineer roles
- Payment system with multiple providers (PayPay, WeChat Pay, Alipay)
- Email verification and notification system
- Job posting and application management
- IT project posting and application
- Scout/recruitment feature with auto-matching
- Advanced talent point system support
- Subscription management with trial period
- Payment approval workflow with email notifications
- Responsive UI with Tailwind CSS

Fixed issues:
- Database schema synchronization
- Port number configuration (NEXT_PUBLIC_URL)
- Payment processing error handling

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
